<NAME_MOB_ASHE>
<MYNAME>, you are one of the best customers
we of Silk Country have ever had.
<PAGE>
As a sign of our friendship and appreciation, we
would like to give you an adorable animal as a
gift. 
<PAGE>
I've been charged with seeing it given to you,
and have taken good care of it in preparation!
<PAGE>
However, it will need a very large tree to live
comfortably. Why not ask your carpenter about
that?
<PAGE>
Once a big tree has been made in your Safari,
please come see me. I will give the animal to
you then.

<NAME_MOB_MARIEL>
<RED>You don't want to see this message!</RED>

<NAME_MOB_YOSHINO>
<RED>You don't want to see this message!</RED>

<NAME_MOB_KENNETH>
Hey there, Pardner! Thanks ta you, whole
bushels of new and fun goods can be found in
my country.
<PAGE>
Now see, our leader has decided it's only right
we do something to show you our appreciation.
<PAGE>
So right now, I'm holding on to one of Wheat
Country's signature animals. A real cute little
feller it is, too.
<PAGE>
But the little guy is used to living on our wide
open plains. I reckon it's a good idea to let him
live in the Safari.
<PAGE>
C'mon back and see me once there's a big rock
mountain built in the Safari. I'll give the little guy
to ya then.
<PAGE>
Oh! Go on and see your carpenter about building
that. He'll know what ta do.

<NAME_MOB_ENNIO>
<RED>You don't want to see this message!</RED>

<NAME_MOB_IOANE>
Y'know, <MYNAME>, we've known each other
for a really long time now, right?
<PAGE>
Oh! I almost forgot...
<PAGE>
The king of Tropical Country said to give you an
animal as a present, since you've been so good
to us.
<PAGE>
It's one of our land's signature animals. But I
think it'd be happiest if there were a big tree in
the Safari.
<PAGE>
Come back and see me once there's one made,
okay? I'll give it to you then.
<PAGE>
Oh, you might wanna see your carpenter about
building the tree. I'm sure he'll know what to do.

<NAME_MOB_KATRINA>
<MYNAME>. We're friends.
<PAGE>
My country's elder likes you, too. Wants to give
you a present.
<PAGE>
It's an animal. But, there's a condition.
<PAGE>
It needs ice. Lots of ice. Without a glacier, it
won't be happy. Make one.
<PAGE>
Ask the carpenter how. He'll know.

<NAME_MOB_ASHE>
<MYNAME>, you are one of the best customers
we of Silk Country have ever had.
<PAGE>
As a sign of our friendship and appreciation, we
would like to give you an adorable animal as a
gift. 
<PAGE>
I've been charged with seeing it given to you,
and have taken good care of it in preparation!
<PAGE>
I'll bring it with me next time. Please come see
me then, so I can give it to you.

<NAME_MOB_MARIEL>
<MYNAME>!! Thanks sooo much for buying lots
and lots of stuff from us!
<PAGE>
Even the Cabin Country president is really super
grateful to you!
<PAGE>
That's why we decided to give you a famous
Cabin Country animal as a present!
<PAGE>
Think of it as a present from the whole of Cabin
Country! Go on and take it, 'kay? You don't hafta
be shy!
<PAGE>
Oh! I don't have it with me today, but I'll bring it
next time! Be sure to drop by, okay?

<NAME_MOB_YOSHINO>
You've been really, really good to us in Sakura
Country, big boss. It makes a body want to do
something in return.
<PAGE>
Even our monarch, the Tycoon, thinks highly of
you!
<PAGE>
So much so, His Majesty decided to gift you
with one of the animals from his own wildlife
preserve.
<PAGE>
I know that sounds fancy, but it's basically a
wild animal. An adorable one, though! Take
good care of it, okay?
<PAGE>
I don't have it with me today, but I'll bring it
along next time. Please come see me then,
okay?

<NAME_MOB_KENNETH>
Hey there, Pardner! Thanks ta you, whole
bushels of new and fun goods can be found in
my country.
<PAGE>
Now see, our leader has decided it's only right
we do something to show you our appreciation.
<PAGE>
So right now, I'm holding on to one of Wheat
Country's signature animals. A real cute little
feller it is, too.
<PAGE>
But the little guy is used to living on our wide
open plains. I reckon it's a good idea to let it live
in the Safari.
